page.title: 05Ecology.
page.content: The weather in this area is mostly wet,it can rain heavily and in summer it can get quite sunny.In winter there is usually much more rain than snow, but it is still very cold.In the summer there is only a short period of warm weather.The prevailing wind is westerly. Most of the area has fir trees in it, they have been planted by the forestry commission.Apart from the village,some fields and the forestry,the rest of the area is heather and heathland.The soil is mainly made up of peat with the hill areas being rock with a thin soil covering.
